name: Fast and Flurrious
description:
Fast and Flurrious: A game for three players, who are cold as ice.

*Requires a mouse to be the best snowman.*

Play as a bear or a rabbit, and try to get to the end of the track. Seems easy right? Well get your annoying friend and have them play as a snowman who shakes the earth and throws snowballs. You know, that friend we all have that doesn't want to participate when you sled. They want to stay inside and text, or update their blog. They use the word "musing" in conversation, completely unironically.

Just get them to play this game, so they'll stop going on about the new beer garden they found.

WASD = Bear

IJKL = Rabbit

Roll the mouse scroll wheel left and right to tilt the terrain, left click to shift it forward, and right click to throw snowballs = Snowman

Game made through the talents of Ryan Cavanaugh, Jun Ma, Will Zhou, and Sarah Doukakos.
